channel.title: TanguySalmon on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in TanguySalmon on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Introduction to the fuzzy search
item.description: It is always great to see contributions from our community merged, it reminds the power of working on an open-source project. Especially when there are great features at stake, like the fuzzy search. In this case, we are talking about the Levenshtein algorithm. It should be available in version 1.7.7 thanks to Lathanao and it will definitely improve both the user experience and the conversion rate on your site! Wow, but what is it?
